name: Tejas Bubane
bio: I love Ruby for its expressiveness, readability and the awesome community. I learnt a lot of good practices in Ruby while solving exercises on exercism and later started using it to mentor people in my workplace. Now I am really excited to do it on a wider scale!

name: Tim Ryan
bio: I've been working professionally with Ruby on the backend for about 5 years. Looking forward to share my love of Ruby.

name: Tyler Ferraro
bio: I have been building web applications in Ruby on Rails for over 8 years. It has a great ecosystem and supportive community that I enjoy being a part of.
